remarks.format: ## Remarks 子类可以使用此方法的值属性更改而不是重写时进行响应以提供新函数。Subclasses of the can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the to provide a new function. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性回调和验证](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md). 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
